title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: Humans tends not to be contented, we always want more and fail to recognise that which we have and where we are is better than the past,it might have been worst ,A roof over your head and food to eat is better than none ,think of the homeless during cold weather,rain ,sunny season and be appreciative ,then you will learn to give a helping hands and touch life's the little you can ,givers never lack .As we all look for daily bread and want more ,let be thankful and extend helping hands ,helping to change our environment the little we can.
